battles.name: Battle of Changban
des: Zhang Fei then stood at the bridge, none of Cao Cao's men dared to go near him, buying time for Liu Bei escape.

battles.name: Battle of Guandu
des: Cao Cao and Shen Pei are in the battle of live and death, Cao's army capture Wuchao

battles.name: The burning of the Shu camps
des: Lu Xun use fire attack burning more than 40 Shu Camps

battles.name: The rise of all heroes
des: All heroes rise up to attack Yellow Turban Rebellion

battles.name: Attack of Vassal
des: All Vassals paritcipated in the war to suppress the rebellion

battles.name: Let's Go
des: All the forces recruited soldiers, trying to prepare for war

battles.name: Battle of Red Cliffs
des: The Sun-Liu coalition finally used fire to destroy Cao's army

battles.name: The Battle of Jingzhou
des: Sun-Li's Army silently attack Jingzhou, inside and outside combined to capture Jingzhou
